mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT('表结构不一致 tbName:',tb_name,' 期望字段:',exp_columns,' 数据库中字段:',db_columns) as msg FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*)= 3 as fg,'happiness' as tb_name,group_concat(COLUMN_NAME) db_columns, 'ID,CITY,NUM' exp_columns FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'happiness' AND COLUMN_NAME in('ID','CITY','NUM') GROUP BY TABLE_NAME UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*)= 4 as fg,'class_info' as tb_name,group_concat(COLUMN_NAME) db_columns, 'ID,SCORE,CLASS,USER_NAME' exp_columns FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'class_info' AND COLUMN_NAME in('ID','SCORE','CLASS','USER_NAME') GROUP BY TABLE_NAME )a WHERE fg=0
